tweet_text: @JoeRoussos If they are serious comments, then you're not doing the author any favours by letting them waste time with serial rejections. I once reviewed the same book three times for three presses, my advice (and the other reviewers') ignored each time. That's poor authorial judgement.

tweet_text: The only time I've seen a human face from my test drive forward was when I picked the car up from the dealer after getting a flat tire. The only time I've received a call back after leaving a VM at my dealer is never.
